trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Phoenixville
There were no other sightings in Phoenixville on or around April 21st 2013
divs: sighting detailswas walking to my truck and observed what seemed to be a star that had a little bit of a cooler\not usual color to it. i looked down to open my truck door and upon looking back up, found the star-like light was gone. i thought that since i was looking up through the branches of a tree that was starting to get spring buds on it, this disappearance may have been a trick of the light disappearing behind some branches. but as i looked carefully into the sky, found no light where i could swear i had just seen one. i walked back toward my truck carefully trying to remember and analyze what i thought i just seen, and when i looked up again, saw the exact same light in the same place, this time blinking once before completely disappearing. not the most dramatic sighting ever, but decided to report as this matched the description of a sighting that occurred a half-hour earlier in new hampshire. they saw their thing in the southern sky and i saw mine in pennsylvania in the northern sky.
Summary: Star like object suddenly appearing and disapearing
